MicroStudy is the accurate cloud-based data collection solution for clinical research.

Positively change the way you collect data

USER-FRIENDLY + EASY SET UP

Intuitively designed software that is easy-to-set-up and easy-to-use for simple and complex studies.

RELIABLE + ACCURATE DATA

Our automated system delivers the ability to track data in real-time and generate reports on demand.

FLEXIBLE + RESPONSIVE

A data collection system that is flexible, training customized to your team, and support services responsive to your needs.

"Knowing that MicroStudy will reach back out to lapsed participants, and that I can easily adjust the study for individual participants has made collecting data easy and reliable."

Senior Administrator, Conducting a National Study, Public University

Click below to download our 1-page info sheet about MicroStudy.

Download PDF

MicroStudy leverages user-centered design components that meet and exceed the needs of clinical researchers, administrators and participants alike.

ADMINISTRATOR / RESEARCHER
  • Effortless study set up for Administrators
  • Clear, customized daily reports
  • Easy-to-use interface to manage participants
  • Ability to adapt and adjust protocols based on administrators' needs
  • Real-time online reporting of participant data for easy monitoring

PARTICIPANT
  • Simple surveys that prevent participant fatigue
  • Flexible platform that can be adjusted based on participant
  • Easy-to-use automated phone system
  • Proactive engagement to ensure compliance
  • Automated call-backs to participants to increase study completion rates
  • Options to connect to research staff/message box
